front.title: OSPF-TE Extensions for Shared Mesh Protection

abstract.t: This document describes extensions to the OSPF[1]/OSPF-TE[2] protocolto support Sharing/Restoration information, using opaque LSAs.The extension presented here enables the source router to obtain abackup route to a destination such that minimal amount of protectionbandwidth reservation is needed. In other words, we provide a methodby which one may easily increase sharing of backup linkssignificantly, without having to go through each and every possiblebackup route.
